title: unnaruL Indennaai
sahitya:
unnaruL Indennai enruyya sheivaiyO panniruk-koDaikkaram paDaittiTTa murugaiyyE


caraNam 1    innalUrum pOdellAm unniDam ivvEzhaiyEn pan murai muraiyiTTum phalan Edum kiTTavillai
    caraNam 2    ponnaDi unadE en pughaliDam enreNNi enrumE pOTrum nAn EmATram uralAmO
    caraNam 3    tangu taDai Eduminri dharaNIyOrukkenrE pongumun karuNaiyil pangenakkillaiyO
    caraNam 4    engum niraindavanE edilum sirandavanE sankaTam uTru nAn salippuTriDalAmE
